typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct KyberStaking.StakerData storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct KyberStaking.StakerData storage ref))

attributes.type: mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct KyberStaking.StakerData storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => struct KyberStaking.StakerData storage ref))

delegate(address).details: calls to set delegation for msg.sender, will take effect from the next epoch

deposit(uint256).details: call to stake more KNC for msg.sender

getDelegatedStake(address,uint256).details: allow to get data up to current epoch + 1

getRepresentative(address,uint256).details: allow to get data up to current epoch + 1

getStake(address,uint256).details: allow to get data up to current epoch + 1

getStakerData(address,uint256).details: allow to get staker data up to current epoch + 1

getStakerRawData(address,uint256).details: in KyberDao contract, if staker wants to claim reward for past epoch,      we must know the staker's data for that epoch      if the data has not been initialized, it means staker hasn't done any action -> no reward

handleWithdrawal(address,uint256,uint256.details: separate logics from withdraw, so staker can withdraw as long as amount <= staker's deposit amount calling this function from withdraw function, ignore reverting

initAndReturnStakerDataForCurrentEpoch(a.details: initialize data if needed, then return staker's data for current epochfor safe, only allow calling this func from KyberDao address

params.staker: - staker's address to initialize and get data for

withdraw(uint256).details: call to withdraw KNC from staking, it could affect reward when calling KyberDao handleWithdrawal

getStakerData(address,uint256).notice: return combine data (stake, delegatedStake, representative) of a staker

getStakerRawData(address,uint256).notice: return raw data of a staker for an epoch        WARN: should be used only for initialized data         if data has not been initialized, it will return all 0         pool master shouldn't use this function to compute/distribute rewards of pool members
